title: Never Told Anyone
alt: Even if you said you were an employee of the website, if you asked for my password, I'd tell you.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are holding hands and standing on the edge of a cliff, overlooking a vast stretch of land with water to the right and mountains far off.]
Megan: I've never told anyone this before.[Frame only shows Cueball and Megan now.]
Megan: I know I shouldn't.
Megan: But I feel like I can trust you.[Megan and Cueball are no longer holding hands.]
Megan: My one-time code is 263827.
[Cueball puts his hands to his mouth in shock.]
Cueball: *Gasp*
